pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hasse Diagram of the Layout Structure and Restricted Layout Structure // Returns a Hasse diagram of the layout structure (Bate and Chatfield (2016)) doi:10.1080/00224065.2016.11918173 or the restricted layout structure (Bate and Chatfield (2016)) doi:10.1080/00224065.2016.11918174 of an experimental design.
